channel.title: Changing what NPCs say?(And other questions)
channel.description: Hey guys, I'm currently using ButterScape for my server and some NPC's say to go to www.*****.whatever to get the butterscape client and I'd like to remove it. And for other questions: How can I place npc's where I want/edit what they do How do I change the XP rate, drop rate ect? Thanks ~Endrien

item.title: Changing what NPCs say?(And other questions)
item.dc:creator: @endrien endrien
item.description:
@endrien wrote:

[quote=“grayfoxx, post:2, topic:275851”]i think you need to visit npchandler.java or cfg[/quote]Thank you, it was in npchandler.java

Read full topic
item.source: Changing what NPCs say?(And other questions)
